::Spears::

She nods in agreement. "We'll wait then."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker/Ramulus::
> 
> Striker nods. "We'll wait for Ramulus then," he says, looking at 
the CR 
> chamber to see Rhinox's progress. The bot was being repaired 
nicely, he 
> should be out soon.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus, Fliq, and Brix load the two pods into the transport, 
entering it and 
> launching off toward the Ark.
